title: Square Enix Game Bundle

embed.description: Pay what you want and support GamesAid and Make-A-Wish

body: So for anyone that is into Square Enix games, this is an absolutely amazing bundle and it's also for charity, so go nuts for this.

replies.body:
If you went to the page you would find out.

>Pay $1 or more for Last Remnant, Life Is Strange Episode 1, Tomb Raider I, II + III, and Murdered: Soul Suspect.
Pay more than the average price to also receive Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn (with 30 days of FREE play for new subscribers), Just Cause Collection, Front Mission Evolved, Gyromancer, Yosumin, Tomb Raider: Anniversary, Tomb Raider: Legend, Tomb Raider: Underworld, and Humble Store coupons for 20% off Just Cause 3 and 33% off Life is Strange Season Pass.
Pay $8.99 or more for all of that plus Lara Croft & the Temple of Osiris, Tomb Raider: GOTY Edition, and Hitman Absolution: Elite Edition.

Current Average price is $5.35

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WEmgGuGr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-30T13:03:32.482+0000)
>
> If you went to the page you would find out.
> Pay more than the average price to also receive Final Fantasy XIV: A Realm Reborn (with 30 days of FREE play for new subscribers), Just Cause Collection, Front Mission Evolved, Gyromancer, Yosumin, Tomb Raider: Anniversary, Tomb Raider: Legend, Tomb Raider: Underworld, and Humble Store coupons for 20% off Just Cause 3 and 33% off Life is Strange Season Pass.
> Pay $8.99 or more for all of that plus Lara Croft & the Temple of Osiris, Tomb Raider: GOTY Edition, and Hitman Absolution: Elite Edition.

dude thats amazing
